availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on October 26, 1815, Boyd graduated from Cincinnati Law School in 1836. Sometime after his graduation he began practicing law in Newport, Kentucky. Boyd served as the Mayor of Newport from 1855 to 1856. He was serving as the county Judge in 1861. Died on April 20, 1891 in Newport, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Frederick Augustus Boyd (October 26, 1815 - April 20, 1891), Memorial # 88459772, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=88459772&ref=acom, (accessed June 15, 2017); Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 44A; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 616. Law Department of the University of Cincinnati: The Cincinnati Law School, (University of Cincinnati Law Department, 1904), 10.
